comment._content:
I love the facial expressions and the dress code =]
Also, the setup and positioning of all the people (whether they knew it or nnot they were standing in a perfect position for a photo like this one) 
Great job ! Great talent =]

comment.author: 8793648@N06
comment._content: Even after the installation of traffic lights, Sydney had regular police on 'point duty' plus mounted police to help control crowds during moring and afternoon peak periods. This was in the days before flexitime; the great majority of office workers in Sydney worked fixed hours, generally 9-5, or 8-4, or variations thereof.

comment.author: 24052676@N03
comment._content: And not a mobile phone or Ipod in sight, no-one permanently attached to earphones as if their lives depended on it.  People actually communicating with their surroundings and being aware of what is going on around them.
